about_the_game:
Soundtrack for Space Ribbon


Full mini-album Distracted to Drivingsoundtrack for Space Ribbon, featuring music and mixes by the excellent Anigman.

1 - Anichrome

2 - Comet

3 - Dingle Drums

4 - Distracted to Driving

5 - Lunar

6 - Point of Return

7 - Truck

Compositions produced by Anigman in Liverpool from 1998 - 2008. With specific Felantix mixes 2015 created for Space Ribbon.

fullgame.name: Space Ribbon - Slipstream to the Extreme

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo

name: Space Ribbon - Soundtrack Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
